components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
The webkit build in Ti Desktop SDK 1.1.0 does not fully support the DOM drag & drop API. The drop event never fires. Although the d&d API comes straight from hell and is a pain to use it's working on the Mac version.

Unfortunately the API is not working in recent versions of Safari/Chrome for Windows either (last that I checked)...

...Just tested on Linux, no drop event there either.

I realize there are bugs in existence for d&d already (marked fixed!), but I'm not allowed to comment on them. So I'm creating a new and more specific one. I can make a testcase if that helps.
fields.summary: Drag & Drop API: Windows: No drop event when dragging from desktop

comments.body:
Marc

We cannot accept a ticket unless it includes some code that demonstrates the issue, which can also be used to prove the fix. Please read the [Creating Good Use-cases|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-CreatingGoodUsecases] guide. Please insure it runs without modification.

Also, please include a link to the other tickets you have mentioned.

Once the ticket has been corrected, we can move it to the correct project.

Thanks

I will close this for the moment. Once the usecase has been added, I will be happy to reopen and move it to the correct project.

Thanks
